Please select pickup/dropoff windows. Please note: laundry must be available at the beginning of the window and accessible until the end of the window. Provider may arrive between any of these times. It is fine if the laundry is unattended.

Please place clothes in 13 gallon bags (Washboard bags or 13 gallon plastic kitchen bags). Each bag will be washed as an individual load, so please sort with like colors as desired. 
 
 Place delicates and hang dry items in a separate bag inside the 13 gallon bag. These will be given special care and hung dry instead of placed in the dryer, then folded and returned with the rest of the load. Hang dry and delicates will accrue an additional charge of $1 each. 
 
 All laundry is washed with Tide and OxyClean. Fabric softener will be added as requested (not recommended for towels). Fabric softener can not be added to only part of a load, please separate into separate bags as necessary. We use "x" fabric softener. 
 
 All laundry not set aside as delicate or hang dry will be dried on medium heat then folded. 
 
 If the following items apply please specify if instruction applies to all bags, or only specific ones, and any additional details.
